description: There has been no water in our area for three days. The pipe near the main road seems broken. Location: Kimihurura, KG 123 St.
Umuhanda wo mu gace kacu wangiritse cyane, imodoka ntizibasha kuhanyura neza. Hari ibyobo binini cyane.
I waited for 5 hours at the Kacyiru Health Center but could not see a doctor. Many patients were waiting and only one doctor was available.
Abarimu bo mu ishuri rya Muhazi ntibaza kenshi. Abana bacu ntibiga neza kubera kubura abarimu.
I applied for my ID card three months ago and still haven't received it. When I went to check at the sector office, they said my application was lost.
Amashanyarazi aracika buri munsi mu gace kacu. Biratugoye cyane gukora no kwiga nijoro.
